PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Suzuki coupling reaction of the dibromide 2a,b with 3-thienylboronic acid gave 3,4-bis(3-thienyl)pyrrole-2,5-dione ( 3a,b ).

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the "Property Value" entities can be identified as follows:

1. "Suzuki coupling reaction": This is a chemical reaction involving the coupling of two molecules, specifically the dibromide 2a,b with 3-thienylboronic acid.
2. "dibromide 2a,b": This is a chemical compound consisting of two molecules of bromide (Br2) linked together.
3. "3-thienylboronic acid": This is a chemical compound consisting of a 3-thienyl group (a type of aromatic ring) linked to a boronic acid group (HBO2).
4. "3,4-bis(3-thienyl)pyrrole-2,5-dione (3a,b)": This is the product of the Suzuki coupling reaction, which is a chemical compound consisting of a pyrrole ring with two 3-thienyl groups attached to it, linked to a boronic acid group.

Therefore, the "Property Value" entities in the given paragraph are:

1. Suzuki coupling reaction
2. Dibromide 2a,b
3. 3-thienylboronic acid
4. 3,4-bis(3-thienyl)pyrrole-2,5-dione (3a,b)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. "dibromide 2a,b": This entity refers to the value of the material property of the dibromide compound.
2. "3-thienylboronic acid": This entity refers to the value of the material property of the 3-thienylboronic acid compound.
3. "3,4-bis(3-thienyl)pyrrole-2,5-dione (3a,b)": This entity refers to the value of the material property of the 3,4-bis(3-thienyl)pyrrole-2,5-dione compound.

Therefore, the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph are:

1. Dibromide 2a,b
2. 3-thienylboronic acid
3. 3,4-bis(3-thienyl)pyrrole-2,5-dione (3a,b)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| dibromide 2a,b |
| 3-thienylboronic acid |
| 3,4-bis(3-thienyl)pyrrole-2,5-dione (3a,b) |
